title: Sri Lanka lifts curfew from 0600am to 600pm on May 14
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will lift the curfew on Saturday May at 6 AM and re-impose at 6 PM and on Sunday the curfew will be lifted at 5 AM, President’s Media Division said.
It’s not clear if the country will remove the partial curfew after the appointment of the new Prime Minister.
Following a violent clash between pro-government mobsters and unharmed anti-government de monsters, Sri Lanka imposed curfews on May 09 and has continued partially since then.(Colombo/May13/2022)
